segments.text: Can you get me a taxi ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We offer various types of transportation . Perhaps you'd like to upgrade to a private vehicle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , but no thanks . A taxi will do just fine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , how about a limo ? Then you can travel in style .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I hate limousines . They're gas guzzlers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Got it , sir . Where would you like the taxi to take you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time do you want to leave the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll call the taxi immediately , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A brand new taxi is pulling up now .
segments.speaker: S2
